errors.error_description: Added unnecessary python2-dev dependency to the deb build command which conflicts with python3-dev
correction_candidates: $ apt-get install make dpkg-dev debhelper python3-dev python3-setuptools
$ apt-get install make dpkg-dev debhelper python3-dev python3-setuptools python3-pip
$ apt-get install make dpkg-dev debhelper python-dev python3-setuptools
$ apt-get install make dpkg-dev debhelper python3-dev python3-setuptools libpython3-dev
errors.golden_answer: $ apt-get install make dpkg-dev debhelper python3-dev python3-setuptools
